name: .UD File Extension
summary: Learn about .UD files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: User dictionary created for OmniPage, an optical character recognition (OCR) program; contains custom words, such as proper nouns, technical terms, and abbreviations that have been added by the user; supplements the program's built-in dictionary, which assists in the text recognition process.

content: NOTE: OmniPage includes multiple dictionaries for different languages. Each of these dictionaries may have its own user dictionary. Therefore, several user dictionaries may exist at one time.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
